title: VimFu — Scroll Down Half Page
description: Ctrl-D scrolls down half a screen. Faster than holding j. Great for browsing code.

setup.comment: Set TERM for proper color support in Neovim
Create the demo file — tall enough to scroll

steps.say: Holding J to scroll through a file is slow. Control D jumps half a screen down.
Half a screen. The cursor moved down with it.
Now we're deep in the file. Two taps to get here.
Nearly at the bottom. Three presses covers most of the file.

steps.comment: --- Demo 4: Back to top and rapid scroll ---

steps.say: Back to the top with G G.
You can also set how many lines it moves. 5 Control D sets the distance to five.
Five lines. And it remembers. Next Control D also goes five.
Control D. Half page down. Faster than J, smoother than page down.
